title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t0.0
text: Words matter. In particular, the words we use to describe technology within an organization matter.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t9.0
text: While IKEA product names may be hard to pronounce, the retailer is crystal clear about how it talks about technology.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t15.0
text: Today, we talk with Barbara Martin Coppola, the Chief Digital Officer at IKEA Retail, about indirect benefits from artificial intelligence.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t25.0
text: Welcome to Me, Myself & AI, a podcast on artificial intelligence in business.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t30.0
text: Each episode, we introduce you to someone innovating with AI.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t34.0
text: I'm Sam Ransbotham, Professor of Information Systems at Boston College.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t38.0
text: I'm also the guest editor for the AI and Business Strategy Big Idea Program at MIT Sloan Management Review.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t45.0
text: And I'm Shirvin Kottobande, Senior Partner with BCGE, and I co-lead BCGE's AI practice in North America.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t53.0
text: And together, MIT, SMR, and BCGE have been researching AI for five years, interviewing hundreds of practitioners

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t61.0
text: and surveying thousands of companies on what it takes to build and to deploy and scale AI capabilities across the organization

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t69.0
text: and really transform the way organizations operate.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t75.0
text: Today, we're talking with Barbara Martin Coppola. She's Chief Digital Officer for IKEA.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t80.0
text: Barbara, thanks for taking the time to talk with us.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t82.0
text: Thank you for having me.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t84.0
text: The title of our podcast is Me, Myself & AI, so we tend to focus on the individual and the individual story behind technology.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t91.0
text: Let's start there. Can you describe your current role at IKEA?

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t95.0
text: I'm Chief Digital Officer at IKEA Retail, which is the world's largest furnishing retailer with 367 stores in 30 plus markets.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t106.0
text: And my role really is I'm responsible for the overall digital development business for the company as well as the digital transformation.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t116.0
text: You've got a pretty significant background, I think, roles at Google and YouTube and Samsung, Texas Instruments, and then school in Spain and France.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t126.0
text: Can you connect things you've learned in some of those past roles to how you've applied them to your current role?

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t132.0
text: I have worked now in four different industries, in semiconductors, then I went to consumer electronics, pure digital, and now I'm in retail.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t142.0
text: And in all those places, digital technology played a very, very important part.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t147.0
text: I'm connecting the dots between everything that I've learned in the past and both in business models, in different ways of organizing companies, different cultures, and leadership as well,

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t161.0
text: to lead the company towards modernization, digitalization, and different business models.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t168.0
text: My time at Google, for instance, taught me what performance is.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t173.0
text: And what I mean by that is how to use agility iterations and measured outcomes of projects at Samsung, which to me was the best example of execution I've seen in my life.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t189.0
text: I was based in South Korea, and somehow I see the power of the collective.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t195.0
text: And so how does it translate now to the environment at IKEA?

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t199.0
text: Once the consensus is reached, then how to be clear about, okay, now we've got the decision, we go.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t207.0
text: I can go on and on, but at the end of the day, I think it's adapting to the different cultural norms and trying to bring from other places and actually augment it for the benefit of the company and the well-being of people and the reward that it can be to achieve things together.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t227.0
text: It's great. Barbara, how does AI fit into the overall digital roadmap?

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t234.0
text: AI is absolutely core, essential.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t237.0
text: I really believe that data is the most important asset the company has today.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t243.0
text: AI is being applied pretty much every step of the way in the value chain of retailing.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t250.0
text: It has potential for pretty much everything.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t253.0
text: And so it's a choice of focus and it's a choice of business outcomes and where do we put the data scientists to be creating magic really.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t262.0
text: We focus the creation of AI towards different values or outcomes.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t269.0
text: That plus the appetite of the company to create amazing things, knowing how AI can be a magic wand if we want it to be, then the belief of the company that this is a key component for the success and competitivity of the company matters a whole lot as well.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t287.0
text: So is there a particular project that you can give us some details on that you're excited about that's happened recently or that your team has been involved with?

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t294.0
text: There's one actually that I love personally.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t298.0
text: It's about democratizing design.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t301.0
text: What do I mean by that?

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t303.0
text: You know, this feeling where you want to decorate something as beautiful as what you have seen in the store, but you don't know where to start.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t311.0
text: And so what we have done is just with the comfort of your mobile phone, you can scan your room, take pictures on the way, and then through visual AI, we actually give you back a picture where you can move the furniture.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t327.0
text: You can delete it and you can actually fit in 3D models of ITI furniture that adapt to the size of your space.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t336.0
text: So imagine how powerful that is.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t339.0
text: Visual AI is an amazing team based in California called Geomagical Labs, and I am very, very, very excited.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t346.0
text: It's coming up in the coming months, and I think it's going to revolutionize this anxiety of filling up a space without being a decorator.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t355.0
text: I want you to know that I am sitting at an IKEA desk that I bought 15 years ago.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t360.0
text: But does it fit? You don't know from virtual reality if it was going to fit there or not.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t364.0
text: It's perfect. I love it so much. I arrange my house around it, and I have exactly your chair also, which I bought with the desk.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t374.0
text: I had exactly the same setting here, actually. It's one of those that goes up and down.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t379.0
text: So when you get tired of being sitting in a Zoom, you just go up and you feel better.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t384.0
text: But seeing that you have that makes me feel that I made the right choice.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t389.0
text: Yes.

id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t395.0

id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t400.0

id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t403.0
text: If you have a moment, please consider leaving us an Apple podcast review or a rating on Spotify and share our show with others you think might find it interesting and helpful.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t417.0
text: There must be so many other examples, particularly for a traditional retailer that is underexplored or not even on their radar.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t428.0
text: Because I look at your background and you've been in digital-first companies where everything's been built on an understanding of digital and data and technology.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t441.0
text: And then at a place like IKEA or other iconic retailers where I have to assume there is a transition or a transformation that needs to happen from old school to new school.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t455.0
text: What are some of the things you've observed or some lessons or some advice for other retailers who are used to a different way of doing things?

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t467.0
text: And now they have all this opportunity, the magic wand that you're talking about.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t471.0
text: But how do they know where to create that magic and what's the art of the possible with it?

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t478.0
text: It's a great question.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t480.0
text: I believe that AI is unlimited.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t483.0
text: And so it's really saying, okay, what space do we want to get better at and have the open-mindedness to make different functions work together, especially digital functions and data scientists.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t499.0
text: I'll give you an example.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t501.0
text: IKEA went to have big blue stores outside of the main cities, and that was the main business model, to having not only a variety of different stores, but also a lot of digital touchpoints.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t514.0
text: And so that creates a lot of complexity.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t517.0
text: How do the flow of goods needs to be operated so that the costs are not going to the roof?

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t525.0
text: And that challenge itself is so complex that it requires AI to be able to be solved for.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t534.0
text: There's many variables.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t536.0
text: There is demand for casting.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t537.0
text: There is the size of the goods.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t539.0
text: There is the availability of items.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t541.0
text: There is a price.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t543.0
text: And so at the end of the day, AI applied to this space is pretty much the only way to operate the business in a modern way.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t554.0
text: So just with that and Ecom increasing so much during the recent years, we have 5x Ecom in three years actually at IKEA.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t564.0
text: We have saved thanks to AI and enabling the stores to be fulfillment centers.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t570.0
text: We have saved the creation of 15 customer distribution centers.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t576.0
text: That is not only great economically, but it's great for the planet as well.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t579.0
text: And so it's multiple possibilities in a positive way that when you start understanding the power of this, the demand is higher than what we can actually achieve.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t592.0
text: So then the next challenge is how do we scale AI so that we can embed it everywhere in the company.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t600.0
text: So it requires, to paraphrase you, it requires open-mindedness and imagination and focusing on what are the things we want to do differently.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t611.0
text: But also it's hard work, right?

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t614.0
text: Because you've got to then get teams that are not used to working together, the scientists and technology teams to work with store operators and managers.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t625.0
text: What do you think is the biggest misconception in the minds of traditional retailers or just traditional companies about AI?

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t636.0
text: Well, one that I think is fairly common is that AI will come and disrupt people.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t642.0
text: There is a fairly amount of fear that all the knowledge that people have built, a bit of a gut feeling in managing the business would actually be displaced as well.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t654.0
text: But when people start to actually understand that it's augmenting them and not displacing them, and that it's at the service of human beings and at the service of business, people really start demanding it.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t668.0
text: But it takes seeing it, using it, being in those cross-functional teams, being outside of one's comfort zone, and then being very happy to see that the positive outcome was not just a sort of black magic technology.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t686.0
text: It was made by human beings and by this cross-functional team that created this.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t691.0
text: So at the end, this is a human process after all.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t695.0
text: So this digital transformation that you've taken IKEA on has been probably even a bigger cultural transformation.

title: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola
id: Imagining Furniture (and the Future) with AI - IKEA Retail's Barbara Martin Coppola-t704.0
text: And you talked about this with World Economic Forum about how the purpose and mission and culture of IKEA will not change.
